H0.text: Scales are what a reptile’s skin is covered in to protect it from drying out.

H1.text: Bacteria cover a reptile’s skin to protect it from drying out.

H2.text: Oil is a substance that covers reptiles’ skin to protect them from drying out.

H3.text: Dye is what reptiles' skin is covered in to protect them from drying out.

A4.text: Scales allow moisture to be retained within.
